r.s: Manipulate many kinds of password files
r.d: Provides methods to manipulate and authenticate against standard Unix, SMB server, AuthUser (.htpasswd), AuthDigest (.htdigest), CVS pserver and custom formatted password files.
r.n: * Performance improvements for APR MD5 encryption by Ants Aasma <ants.aasma@mig.ee> * Fixed bug in File_Passwd_Common::_open(): could not safe into non-existant file * Fixed security bug in File_Passwd_Common::_auth(): one could be authenticated with a substring of ones actual user name
